decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-df973f5e-7fff-a186-6298-17b219d72ef1"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The proposed amendments to the scheme constitute a material amendment and as such cannot be considered under s96a of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended)</span></p>
description: Non-material amendment to  planning permission 2019/2833 granted 26/09/2019 in relation to adding an additional roof light to front roof slope from 2 to 3 rooflights
